hero.introduction: Feeling lazy today, I just want to retire. /n Currently pursuing my Bachelor in 'Biochemistry and Molecular Biology' and also experienced with Web Development (primarily ReactJS, NextJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS, Postgresql) and Workflow Automation. I'm looking for opportunnity to combine my skills from both worlds and make the magic happen./n I also enjoy automating boring works for myself and others.
